21st Century Visa Vetting Act
A bill to permit the Secretary of Homeland Security to search open source information to determine if an alien is inadmissible to the United States and for other purposes.
21st Century Visa Vetting Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
21st Century Visa Vetting Act
This bill authorizes the Department of Homeland Security to search open source information, including Internet sites and social media postings, of an alien who applies for a visa to enter the United States to determine if the alien is inadmissible under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
